comment:
>>44313333

> [[ UI Messenger – Crimson Guardian Liza ]]
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Though Kainzo's told me he's... disappointed with your performance. Should I be concerned?
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Why would you be? You're not scouting me, are you?
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: You expressed interest.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I said I was considering my options.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Well, it's not really any of your business, but he's also told me that Vyx performed quite adequately, despite her... maturity issues.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: If you are still interested, I can't imagine she's set the bar too high for you.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: By the way, if I was “scouting” you? I'd have come down there myself.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I'll keep all that in mind.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: As far as my “performance” goes, you can ask the other guild members.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: He thinks I put the promise of gems over the raid as a whole.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I just did what I thought was going to end the fight. Turned out to be a bad play.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: Well, then.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: I'll see what else he has to say.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: All that aside, I just wanted to let everyone know I'll be down to take a look at the new facilities, and see if they're as good as Ayla's raving about.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: I'd like to have an opportunity to explore the newest part of town before the message boards are back up and the floodgates are open.
> [[ Crimson Guardian Liza ]]: How's it feel to have your name on an Altar?

> [[ Continued ]]
name: Sylvetica
